SELECT TITLE , RUNNING_TIME , MV_CODE FROM OISONE_MOVIE WHERE MV_CODE = #{mvCode} ORDER BY MV_CODE
SELECT THEATER_CODE , THEATER_NAME , AREA_NAME FROM OISONE_THEATER WHERE USE_THEATER = 'N' AND AREA_NAME = #{areaName} ORDER BY THEATER_CODE

SELECT MV_TIME_CODE , AREA_NAME , TO_CHAR( SCREEN_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD' )AS SCREEN_DAY , SCREEN_TIME , SCREEN_END_TIME , THEATER_CODE , (SELECT TITLE FROM OISONE_MOVIE MOVIE WHERE MV_CODE = (SELECT MV_CODE FROM OISONE_MOVIE_TIME WHERE MV_TIME_CODE = #{mvTimeCode})) AS TITLE , (SELECT THEATER_NAME FROM OISONE_THEATER WHERE THEATER_CODE = (SELECT THEATER_CODE FROM OISONE_MOVIE_TIME WHERE MV_TIME_CODE = #{mvTimeCode})) AS THEATER_NAME , (SELECT ATTACHED_IMG_NAME FROM OISONE_MOVIE_IMG WHERE MV_CODE = (SELECT MV_CODE FROM OISONE_MOVIE_TIME WHERE MV_TIME_CODE = #{mvTimeCode} AND IS_POSTER = 'Y')) AS ATTACHED_IMG_NAME ,(SELECT ( - SEAT_CNT) FROM OISONE_THEATER WHERE THEATER_CODE = (SELECT THEATER_CODE FROM OISONE_MOVIE_TIME WHERE MV_TIME_CODE = #{mvTimeCode})) AS SEAT_LEFT FROM OISONE_MOVIE_TIME WHERE MV_TIME_CODE = #{mvTimeCode}

SELECT MV_TIME_CODE , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME , AGE , TITLE , LOC , A.AREA_NAME , THEATER_NAME , TO_CHAR(SCREEN_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCREEN_DAY , SCREEN_TIME , SCREEN_END_TIME FROM OISONE_MOVIE_TIME MT, OISONE_MOVIE M, OISONE_MOVIE_IMG MI, OISONE_AREA A, OISONE_THEATER T WHERE M.MV_CODE = MI.MV_CODE AND IS_POSTER = 'Y' AND MV_TIME_CODE = #{mvTimeCode} AND MT.AREA_NAME = A.AREA_NAME AND A.AREA_NAME = T.AREA_NAME AND MT.THEATER_CODE = T.THEATER_CODE AND MT.MV_CODE = M.MV_CODE
